attributes.action: Make football fairer by making the referees of football games accountable,in the same way the players and managers are accountable. If their actions deserve them to be banned or fined they should be
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Chelsea FC/FC Barcelona game was rubbished by one man.In this day and age of technology this should not be possible. Also why do referees who mess up on the pitch not get fined or banned.It seems the players are the ones under threat of punishment,this is wrong,ref's must be held accountable too. Punish the referee,he is not god.  Sort this over dominance by referees now,its destroying a brilliant sport.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
